In addition, men have a greater risk of getting the infection than women; for every female who gets sick with nocardiosis, there are about 3 males who get the disease.",CDC,Nocardiosis
What are the symptoms of Nocardiosis ?,"The symptoms of nocardiosis vary depending on which part of your body is affected.
